attributes.action: Permanently remove groups and individuals from face book which mock dead babies.
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, respectfully require H.M Government to enter into discussion with Face book regarding the permanent removal of groups and individuals who mock dead babies. This includes: jokes, innuendo, photographs, drawings, downloads and links. Face book will be made aware of the, said, groups and individuals by their current and/or updated reporting system.
